timeline.bodyText:
Maybe it makes sense to move the added tests to a new class.
Also, can be declared static.
timeline.author: GJL

replies.bodyText:
Ok. I have moved the tests to StreamingJobGraphGeneratorWithGlobalDataExchangeModeTest.
Also make this method static.
replies.author: zhuzhurk

timeline.bodyText: Is there a benefit compared to calling map1.rescale().map(i -> i).setParallelism(2) ?
timeline.author: GJL

replies.bodyText: By specifying ShuffleMode.UNDEFINED these test do not need to have the assumption that  ShuffleMode.UNDEFINED is the default value. So later if the default value is changed it will not break these tests.
replies.author: zhuzhurk
